relation: Great for these types of students
Chabot is great for those who wanna try college out first, and for those who want to transfer. To get to know what you'll have to deal with.

As far as community college goes, chabot is expensive. They will sell you practically anything just to make a quick buck. Community college should not cost this much, especially since the economy is in the pit.
There are sports and clubs and all sorts of activities to do for extra curricular activities.
I haven't eaten there. But I know it's clean.
I don't know much about their dorms, or if they have any for that matter.
The classes and teachers are pretty cool so far.
Plan ahead, and register for classes once you have everything ahead of time. Doing things last minute can start to make you go crazy, I would know.
Chabot is pretty cool. I'm a freshman there. Started my first year of college, things are a little tough but hopefully it'll go smoother soon.

textAfterTable: The classes are good. Academic Rigor It's a great college to go to. Tips for prospective students Don't miss class. Do your work and apply for financial aid! In three sentences Chabot college is a great college. The students and teachers are great. When ever you need help you get help fast. The financial aid is always there to answer question. It's a great college.
